title: The Chordates Diversity in Structure
brief_description: Basic characteristics that relate all chordates, from tiny tunicates to world-ruling primates, are explained. Also describes the diversity and adaptations of vertebrates, the most advanced chordates, with special reference to the relationship between structure and potential for survival
